page_content:
Canvas Directory

Version:MissionOS_2.0

The main use of the Canvas Directory page is to create folders as main folders (directories) or subfolders (subdirectories) to store canvas sheets of MissionOS.

After you log into the application open the Data Manager.

In Data Manager, navigate to Admin > Reporting > Canvas Directory.

 

 

To create the Canvas Directory as the main folder, follow the steps below:

  1. Type a name for the directory to be added.
  2. Select Set as main folder.
  3. Select user from dropdown.
  4. Click Add Directory.
    The added directory gets listed in the table below.

 

 

To create the Canvas Directory as subfolder of an existing directory, follow the steps below:

  1. Type a name for the directory to be added.
  2. Leave Set as main folder
  3. Select from Subdirectory Of to choose the main directory.
  4. Click Add Directory.
    The added directory gets listed in the table below.

 

 

Such created directories are available in canvas sheets section.

Saving canvas sheet to created directory:

In the Edit Canvas Sheet page, enter the canvas sheet details. Click Choose Directory and select which main and sub directories you require the file to be saved in.

 

 

After selecting the directory and sub directory, click Save.

 

 

To watch the Web User Manual video on Canvas Directory, simply click on the thumbnail or link below:

 

 

To watch the Shorts video on How to reach the Canvas Directory interface, simply click on the thumbnail or link below:
